thumb.name: Swan on Lake
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're in Our Thoughts During Your Recovery.William%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EYou've been constantly on our minds and in our hearts. and we wanted you to know that if thoughts could make you well. you'd be better already. because of the many caring thoughts we've sent your way. Get Well Soon%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Cup of Get-Well Cheer
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing%3Cbr%3EYou Well.%3Cbr%3EJessica%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESending you%3Cbr%3Ea cup of cheer...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...to warm your heart.%3Cbr%3Esoothe your soul.%3Cbr%3Eand let you know I care.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope You're Feeling Better%3Cbr%3EDay by Day%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Feel Better
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECoverVerse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhile You're Recovering.%3Cbr%3ETony%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA wish%3Cbr%3Efor lots of rest. relaxation.%3Cbr%3Eand all the other things%3Cbr%3Eyou need to make you better.

thumb.name: The Best Medicine Is Laughter
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHey. Marty!%3Cbr%3EAn apple a day%3Cbr%3Ekeeps the doctor%3Cbr%3Eaway!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E(...if you throw hard%3Cbr%3Eand your aim is accurate.)%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFeel Better Soon!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Overflowing Wishes
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAfter gathering up%3Cbr%3Ethese wishes.%3Cbr%3EWe found we had a load.%3Cbr%3E'Cause when we tried%3Cbr%3Eto stuff 'em in...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe darn things overflowed!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: God Watches Over You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENo matter%3Cbr%3Ehow lost%3Cbr%3Eor alone%3Cbr%3Ewe may feel.%3Cbr%3Ewe can%3Cbr%3Etake comfort%3Cbr%3Ein knowing%3Cbr%3Ethat God%3Cbr%3Eis watching%3Cbr%3Eover us.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm praying%3Cbr%3Efor you. Melody.%3Cbr%3Eand trusting%3Cbr%3Ethat God's love%3Cbr%3Ewill see you%3Cbr%3Ethrough.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe Lord watches over%3Cbr%3Eall who love him...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EPsalms 145:20

thumb.name: Get-Well Advice
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EG et lots of rest.%3Cbr%3EE njoy some peace and quiet.%3Cbr%3ET ake care of yourself.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EW ake up late.%3Cbr%3EE scape into a favorite movie.%3Cbr%3EL ounge around in comfy p.j. 's%3Cbr%3EL et yourself be pampered. %3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope you're on your way%3Cbr%3Eto feeling better soon!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Shoreline Scene
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGet-Well Wishes For You. Morgan%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ETo wish you such a quick return To health and happiness. That you'll be up and out again Much sooner than you'd guess.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Warm Wishes
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESending Warm%3Cbr%3EGet-Well Wishes%3Cbr%3EEspecially%3Cbr%3Efor You.%3Cbr%3EAunt Joan%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIf I could%3Cbr%3Egather sunbeams.%3Cbr%3Eor tug a rainbow%3Cbr%3Efrom the sky.%3Cbr%3EI'd fill your world%3Cbr%3Ewith sunlight%3Cbr%3Eand chase away the rain.%3Cbr%3E
